text: The Negros Cebuano (Cebuano: "mga Negrense"), is a variant dialect of Cebuano language, natively in Negros Oriental and urban city Dumaguete in Central Visayas , They can understand by itself, but mostly in Cebu are pure Cebuano speakers. Both Cebuan, Negrense and Boholanos are called "Bisaya".http://www.humanrights.asia/news/ahrc-news/AHRC-ART-047-2010 Between Negros Occidental Hiligaynon speakers and the Oriental Cebuano speakers having a different language in terms of monotone and vocabulary.https://www.binisaya.com/cebuano/negros ==References== Category:Dialects of the Philippines
title: Negros Cebuano
